messages.content: I'm writing to you hoping to become your next MP for Stoke-on-Trent Central.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stoke has been successful in its bid for investment, securing £2 million investment for Spode Works Streets.
A new £17.6 million investment into the Royal Stoke, providing better patient beds and reducing waiting times.
20,000 new police officers are being recruited nationally, and efforts are being made to ensure as many as possible are recruited in Stoke-on-Trent.

issues.brexitEurope: The current Labour MP has been criticized for being out of touch with the majority of constituents who voted to leave the European Union.
issues.health: A new £17.6 million investment into the Royal Stoke, providing better patient beds and reducing waiting times.

housing.content: Investment in redevelopment of derelict sites around Spode Works.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will work hard to deliver my plan for the people of Stoke-on-Trent Central, but I also need to hear from you.

images.caption: Jo Gideon, a candidate standing in front of a building, possibly in Stoke-on-Trent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: On the reverse is a short survey for community feedback.
